    Linear Algebra 例题

    求解方程组

    例题 1: 有解的方程组

    求解以下线性三元方程组:

    \[\begin{equation} \begin{cases} 2x + 3y + z = 1 \\ 4x + y - z = 2 \\ -2x + 5y + 2z = 3 \end{cases} \end{equation}\]

    写出增广矩阵:

    \[\begin{equation} \left[\begin{array}{ccc|c} 2 & 3 & 1 & 1 \\ 4 & 1 & -1 & 2 \\ -2 & 5 & 2 & 3 \end{array}\right] \end{equation}\]

    使用初等行变换将增广矩阵化为行阶梯形矩阵:

    \[\begin{equation} \left[\begin{array}{ccc|c} 1 & 0 & 0 & 1 \\ 0 & 1 & 0 & 0 \\ 0 & 0 & 1 & -1 \end{array}\right] \end{equation}\]

    检查行列式:

    \[\begin{equation} \text{det} = 2 \cdot (1 \cdot 2 - (-1) \cdot 5) - 3 \cdot (4 \cdot 2 - (-1) \cdot (-2)) + 1 \cdot (4 \cdot 5 - 1 \cdot (-2)) = 2 \cdot (2 + 5) - 3 \cdot (8 - 2) + 1 \cdot (20 + 2) = 14 - 18 + 22 = 18 \neq 0 \end{equation}\]

    因此, 方程组有唯一解. 从行阶梯形矩阵中读出解:

    \[\begin{equation} \begin{cases} x = 1 \\ y = 0 \\ z = -1 \end{cases} \end{equation}\]
